en: Ask ye of Jehovah rain in the time of the latter rain, even of Jehovah that maketh lightnings; and he will give them showers of rain, to every one grass in the field.
hmr: LALPA kâwlinlephai siemtu ngei chu, LALPA kuoma chun ruo nuhnung huna hin ruo ngên ro; chun ama chun ruopui sûr chu pêng a tih, loa thlaihna tin kuoma chun.

en: For the teraphim have spoken vanity, and the diviners have seen a lie; and they have told false dreams, they comfort in vain: therefore they go their way like sheep, they are afflicted, because there is no shepherd.
hmr: Milim chun teplo mei mei a hril a, a lo dawngtuhai khawm chun khêl thu chu an hmu sih a; manga mang- tuhai khawm chun khêl mei mei an mang a, a thlâwn elin an insukthla- muong a nih; chuleiin, berâm angin anni lampui chu an hrawh a, sukrimsikin an um hlak, berâmpu a um naw leiin.

en: Mine anger is kindled against the shepherds, and I will punish the he-goats; for Jehovah of hosts hath visited his flock, the house of Judah, and will make them as his goodly horse in the battle.
hmr: Berampuhai chunga chun ka lunginsenna chu a chawk a, kêlchal- hai chu ka hrem ngei ding a nih; sipaihai LALPA chun a berâmruol Juda sûngkuohai chu a hung sir tah a, indonaa sakawr ṭhatak angin a siem ngei ding a nih.

en: From him shall come forth the corner-stone, from him the nail, from him the battle bow, from him every ruler together.
hmr: Amaa inthawkin a kiha lung dâm, amaa inthawkin a kilna dâm, amaa inthawkin indona thalngul dâm, amaa inthawkin rorêltu dâm an hung suok tlâng vawng ding a ni sih a.

en: And they shall be as mighty men, treading down their enemies in the mire of the streets in the battle; and they shall fight, because Jehovah is with them; and the riders on horses shall be confounded.
hmr: Chun, indona chun an hmêlma- hai chu kawtthlêra chirhak chîl anga chîlin mi thilthawtheitakhai hung nîng an ta, LALPA chu an kuomah a um zing leiin, anni chu do an tih; chun, sakawr chunga chuong mihai khawm chu sukhamhaiin um an tih.

en: And I will strengthen the house of Judah, and I will save the house of Joseph, and I will bring them back; for I have mercy upon them; and they shall be as though I had not cast them off: for I am Jehovah their God, and I will hear them.
hmr: Chun, Juda insûng chu hung sukhrât ka ta, Josef insûng chu sandam ka tih; chun, anni chu hung ṭhuoi kîr nâwk ka tih, an chungah lunginsietna ka nei sih a; chun, anni chu ka lo pei thlâk naw ang hrimin um tâng an tih; chun, an thu chu ngai bawk ka ta, LALPA an Pathien ka ni sih a.

en: And they of Ephraim shall be like a mighty man, and their heart shall rejoice as through wine; yea, their children shall see it, and rejoice; their heart shall be glad in Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, Ephraimhai kha chu mi thilthawtheitak ang nîng an ta, uoin leiin an lungril chu hlim a tih; anih, an thlahai chu hmûng an ta, lâwm an tih; an lungril khawm chu LALPAA chun lâwm bawk a tih.

en: I will hiss for them, and gather them; for I have redeemed them; and they shall increase as they have increased.
hmr: An ta dingin faifûk ka ta, anni ko khâwm ka tih; anni chu kân tlan ta sih a; a lo pung ta ang bawk khan hung insukpung an tih.

en: And I will sow them among the peoples; and they shall remember me in far countries; and they shall live with their children, and shall return.
hmr: Chun, anni chu mipuihai laia chun tûng ka ta; ram hlataka khawm mi hre zing an tih; chun, an nau le têhai leh um an ta, hung kîr nâwk an tih.

en: I will bring them again also out of the land of Egypt, and gather them out of Assyria; and I will bring them into the land of Gilead and Lebanon; and place shall not be found for them.
hmr: Aigupta rama inthawk khawm- in anni chu hung ṭhuoi suok nâwk ka ta. Assuria rama inthawkin la khâwm nâwk ka tih; Gilead le Lebanon rama chun ṭhuoi lût ka ta; an ta dinga hmun indai naw hielin.

en: And he will pass through the sea of affliction, and will smite the waves in the sea, and all the depths of the Nile shall dry up; and the pride of Assyria shall be brought down, and the sceptre of Egypt shall depart.
hmr: Chun, ama chun sukrinumna tuisuoriet chu fe thleng a ta, tui- suorieta chun a fâwnhai chu thâwng a ta. Nile li inthûkhai po po khawm chu kang intan a tih; chun, Assuria chapona chu sukhnuoi nîng a ta, Aigupta lalhmawl chu fe hmang tâng a tih.

en: And I will strengthen them in Jehovah; and they shall walk up and down in his name, saith Jehovah.
hmr: Chun, anni chu LALPAA chun sukhrât ka ta, chun, ama hmingin a suk a tungin fe tâng an tih, LALPA chun a tih.
